short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A focus timer extension with built-in mini-games for break time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay productive and focused with our "Focus Timer with Mini-Game Breaks" Chrome Extension! This extension is perfect for anyone looking to improve concentration, manage time effectively, and take mindful breaks between work sessions.

Features:

Customizable Focus Timer: Easily set a focus duration to match your productivity style. The timer defaults to 25 minutes, but you can change it to any duration that suits your needs!
Non-Disruptive Reminders: Get notified when your focus session is over with a subtle, non-distracting pop-up notification.
Mini-Game Breaks: When the timer ends, unwind and recharge with a fun mini-game â€” "Catch the Falling Object." Enjoy a quick break without losing focus.
Engaging Visuals & Sounds: The mini-game includes interactive animations and sounds for a more engaging experience, making your break enjoyable and refreshing.
Seamless Integration: Runs smoothly in your Chrome browser without disrupting other tasks, allowing you to manage your focus sessions without additional software.
Why Use This Extension?

Boost Productivity: Use the Focus Timer to manage your work intervals with the Pomodoro technique, a proven strategy to stay productive.
Avoid Burnout: Regular, short breaks help reduce stress and keep your mind sharp.
Enjoy Breaks: The integrated mini-game is a fun way to unwind without leaving your browser.
Easy to Use: Simple, intuitive controls make it easy to set focus sessions and enjoy game breaks without any hassle.
Stay Motivated: Visually track your progress and reward yourself with game breaks to keep your motivation high throughout the day.
